channel.title: Kinnera War Video Bush Music Iraq on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: ughhh..
item.description: My computer at work is dieing a slow and painful death. The dell bios diagnostic screen pops up on boot and tells me that my hard drive is going to fail very soon. Ugh.. I am sad. I don’t want to lose everything. I mean I have it all backed up.. for the most part ;) - the thing I am most sad about is my music.. I have ripped so many of my cds so I don’t have to keep them here.
